snippet.title: 「Damascus Gear: Operation Osaka」 Teaser PV
snippet.description:
「Damascus Gear: Operation Osaka」 Website
https://www.damascusgear.net/saikyo-exodus/eng/index.html

In this title, the protagonist inherits a mech known as "Gear" along with 100 million yen worth of debt. They, along with the android operator, must debut as a ranker of the duel gambling hall 「Arena」 to begin bounty hunting and upgrade your Gears in this Robo-customization/Hack & Slash game!

【PRODUCT】

Title：Damascus Gear: Operation Osaka
Platform：Nintendo Switch™ 
Genre：Robo-customize Hack & Slash
Release Date：August 29, 2019
MSRP：19.99＄（incl.tax）
ESRB：T
Players：1
